Enumeration# WKWebpagePreferences.UpgradeToHTTPSPolicy

iOS 18.2+iPadOS 18.2+Mac Catalyst 18.2+macOS 15.2+visionOS 2.2+

```
enum UpgradeToHTTPSPolicy
```

## [Overview](/documentation/WebKit/WKWebpagePreferences/UpgradeToHTTPSPolicy#overview)

A secure navigation policy represents whether or not there is a preference for loading a webpage with https, and how failures should be handled.

## [Topics](/documentation/WebKit/WKWebpagePreferences/UpgradeToHTTPSPolicy#topics)
